name: UNU · SENCO
description:
Made with Unity for 2019's Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam [August 2 to 4, 2019]

HEADPHONES AND GAMEPAD WITH FORCE FEEDBACK / VIBRATION ARE REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME

Toggle between your sight, tact, hearing and smell to find all the totems and explore abstract environments.

Movement - Left Joystick // Toggle Senses with A/B/X/Y buttons // Jump - R1 // Pick - L1 (While in FEEL mode)

Movement Keyboard (Last scene) . Movement  - W-S-A-D // Toggle Senses - Q and E // Jump - Space // Pick (While in Feel mode) - F


  • Game design & planning : Enrique Colinet Morales (itch.io / twitter)
  • Programming : Isaac Moreno Girón (itch.io/ twitter) & Rodrigo Ramírez Vento ( itch.io )
  • 3D Modelling & additional game design : Fernando Romero Gª De Artacho (itch.io / twitter)
  • Concept Art & Menu/Logo design: Jesús Campos (twitter/ artstation)
Music by Ai Yamamoto
